thing-type.label: NZW39 Dimmable Smart Plug
thing-type.description:
Dimmable Smart Plug

Overview

Z-Wave Plug/Dimmer w/Built-in Z-Wave Repeater, combines a Z-Wave Outlet & Range Extender in 1 Module


Inclusion Information

Put the controller into inclusion mode, then push the middle button on the smart plug 3-5 times within 3 seconds


Exclusion Information

Put the controller into exclusion mode, then push the middle button on the smart plug 3-5 times within 3 seconds


Wakeup Information

N/A

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Dimming Step
parameter.description: Percentage of step when switch is dimming up or down (0 = instant)

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Minimum Level
parameter.description: Minimum dimming level for attached light

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: LED Indicator
parameter.description: Turn LED indicator ON when light is ON (paddle switch only)

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Invert Switch

parameter.name: config_5_2
